messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2193
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/5/02 4:25:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... THANK YOU NED~ there is some incredible stuff here~ and UNKIND is never humorous to some of
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/5/02 4:25:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> As an unschooler (a staunch, radical, fanatical one) I am vehemently against
> schooling -- the kind that is done in schools, and is directed by schoolers
> for the benefit of the school establishment -- not the children. But that
> doesn't mean I am against learning or even teaching, so long as it is asked
> for by the learner.


THANK YOU NED~ there is some incredible stuff here~



and UNKIND is never humorous to some of us......in reference to someone
saying we "newbies" should wait to sense senses of humor. ~Denise
>
>
>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
